channel.title: We now accept PayPal! Check Discord #announcements
channel.description:
Check [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) ( #announcements channel for more details, or type [code]?paypal[/code] in any Discord channel.
**Not yet in Discord?** You're missing a lot (and it's required for Alpha/Beta, _anyway_) >>
https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB
